Title: Gem Harvest
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Matt Burnett (story by), Raven Molisee, Ben Levin (story by), Paul Villeco, Rebecca Sugar (story by), Hilary Florido, Kat Morris (story by), Lauren Zuke
Actors: Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle, Deedee Magno
Plot: Steven's autumn visit to see Lapis and Peridot brings a new stranger into his life.
